name: squinted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
squint
to partly close your eyes in order to see more clearly: The sun was shining straight in her eyes and made her squint.
UK If a person or an eye squints, the eye looks in a different direction to the other eye, because of a weakness of the eye muscles: Lili's left eye squinted slightly when she was tired.
